requirements.description: Developers are allowed to use OneSignal in applications directed at children under 13, but they must comply with specific obligations.

type.summary: Use of OneSignal in children-directed apps requires compliance

requirements.description: Developers must obtain verifiable parental consent before sending any push tokens, emails, or other contact information to OneSignal.

type.summary: Obtaining verifiable parental consent is mandatory

requirements.description: An opportunity for parents to opt-out must be provided before any data is sent to OneSignal.

type.summary: Providing an opt-out option is required
